name: DigiCert CertCentral AnyCA REST Gateway Plugin
description: DigiCert CertCentral plugin for the AnyCA REST Gateway framework

ca_plugin_config.name: APIKey
ca_plugin_config.description: API Key for connecting to DigiCert

ca_plugin_config.name: DivisionId
ca_plugin_config.description: Division ID to use for retrieving product details (only if account is configured with per-divison product settings)

ca_plugin_config.name: Region
ca_plugin_config.description: The geographic region that your DigiCert CertCentral account is in. Valid options are US and EU.

ca_plugin_config.name: RevokeCertificateOnly
ca_plugin_config.description: Default DigiCert behavior on revocation requests is to revoke the entire order. If this value is changed to 'true', revocation requests will instead just revoke the individual certificate.

ca_plugin_config.name: SyncCAFilter
ca_plugin_config.description: If you list one or more CA IDs here (comma-separated), the sync process will only sync records from those CAs. If you want to sync all CA IDs, leave this field empty.

ca_plugin_config.name: SyncDivisionFilter
ca_plugin_config.description: If you list one or more Divison IDs (also known as Container IDs) here (comma-separated), the sync process will filter records to only return orders from those divisions. If you want to sync all divisions, leave this field empty. Note that this has no relationship to the value of the DivisionId config field.

ca_plugin_config.name: FilterExpiredOrders
ca_plugin_config.description: If set to 'true', syncing will apply a filter to not return orders that are expired for longer than specified in SyncExpirationDays.

ca_plugin_config.name: SyncExpirationDays
ca_plugin_config.description: If FilterExpiredOrders is set to true, this setting determines how many days in the past to still return expired orders. For example, a value of 30 means the sync will return any certs that expired within the past 30 days. A value of 0 means the sync will not return any certs that expired before the current day. This value is ignored if FilterExpiredOrders is false.

ca_plugin_config.name: Enabled
ca_plugin_config.description: Flag to Enable or Disable gateway functionality. Disabling is primarily used to allow creation of the CA prior to configuration information being available.

enrollment_config.name: LifetimeDays
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: The number of days of validity to use when requesting certs. If not provided, default is 365.

enrollment_config.name: CACertId
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: ID of issuing CA to use by DigiCert. If not provided, the default for your account will be used.

enrollment_config.name: Organization-Name
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: For requests that will not have a subject (such as ACME) you can use this field to provide the organization name. Value supplied here will override any CSR values, so do not include this field if you want the organization from the CSR to be used.

enrollment_config.name: RenewalWindowDays
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: The number of days from certificate expiration that the gateway should do a renewal rather than a reissue. If not provided, default is 90.

enrollment_config.name: CertType
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: The type of cert to enroll for. Valid values are 'ssl' and 'client'. The value provided here must be consistant with the ProductID. If not provided, default is 'ssl'. Ignored for secure_email_* product types.

enrollment_config.name: EnrollDivisionId
enrollment_config.description: OPTIONAL: The division (container) ID to use for enrollments against this template.

enrollment_config.name: CommonNameIndicator
enrollment_config.description: Required for secure_email_sponsor and secure_email_organization products, ignored otherwise. Defines the source of the common name. Valid values are: email_address, given_name_surname, pseudonym, organization_name

enrollment_config.name: ProfileType
enrollment_config.description: Optional for secure_email_* types, ignored otherwise. Valid values are: strict, multipurpose. Default value is strict.

enrollment_config.name: FirstName
enrollment_config.description: Required for secure_email_* types if CommonNameIndicator is given_name_surname, ignored otherwise.

enrollment_config.name: LastName
enrollment_config.description: Required for secure_email_* types if CommonNameIndicator is given_name_surname, ignored otherwise.

enrollment_config.name: Pseudonym
enrollment_config.description: Required for secure_email_* types if CommonNameIndicator is pseudonym, ignored otherwise.

enrollment_config.name: UsageDesignation
enrollment_config.description: Required for secure_email_* types, ignored otherwise. The primary usage of the certificate. Valid values are: signing, key_management, dual_use
